meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ropey.
meanings.sent1: The ropinesses of the old climbing rope made it unsafe to use.
meanings.sent2: The soup's ropinesses made it difficult to slurp.
meanings.sent3: The ropinesses of the spaghetti were so extreme, it looked like a tangled mess of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The ropinesses of the conversation were evident as they kept circling back to the same topic.
meanings.sent5: The ropinesses of the spider's web glistened in the morning dew.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a thick, stringy consistency.
meanings.sent1: The ropinesses of the glue made it hard to separate the papers.
meanings.sent2: The ropinesses of the cheese made it perfect for stretching on pizza.
meanings.sent3: The ropinesses of the slime toy made it both gross and fascinating to play with.
meanings.sent4: The ropinesses of the river's current pulled everything downstream.
meanings.sent5: The ropinesses of the hair gel made his hair stand up in spikes.
